DOC.brief_summary: To compare the outcome of laparoscopic pyelolithotomy with percutaneous nephrolithotomy in patients with >3cm renal pelvis stone.
DOC.brief_title: Laparoscopic Pyelolithotomy Versus Percutaneous Nephrolothotomy for Management of >3cm Renal Pelvis Stone
DOC.criteria: Adults with >3cm renal pelvis stone History of previous surgery on the target kidney Active UTI Coagulopathy
